markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Master Scroll Cache](/Feats.aspx?ID=6404) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 213 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Scroll Trickster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=262)

**Prerequisites**
[Expert Scroll Cache](/Feats.aspx?ID=6403)

</column>

---

Your scroll collection is incredible, brimming with eldritch power, and you can prepare far more of them than an ordinary scroll trickster. In addition to your daily scrolls from the [Basic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2054) and Expert Scroll Caches, add a single scroll with a 6th-rank spell. At 20th level, add a scroll with a 7th-rank spell.
name: Master Scroll Cache
